snippet: Mel Panter is an artist who paints noble cowboys. Gary Panter, his son, is the guy who created the look for “Pee-wee’s Playhouse.” And now they have a two-man hometown exhibition in Sulphur Springs.
lead_paragraph: Mel Panter is an artist who paints noble cowboys. Gary Panter, his son, is the guy who created the look for “Pee-wee’s Playhouse.” And now they have a two-man hometown exhibition in Sulphur Springs.

headline.seo: Mel and Gary Panter Have a Father-and-Son Art Exhibition in Sulphur Springs
